4.4 Ablation studies 

Effectiveness of the UPer Decoder. We firstly compare the original SegFormer-B3 [31] with MLP Decoder and 
another model called SegFormer-B3-Uper that replaces the original MLP decoder with the UPer Decoder. Both 
models use the MiT-B3 backbone in terms of encoder. Results are shown in the first two rows of Table 5. Both 
network versions show similar metrics across the test datasets, with slight variations of roughly 1%. However, one can
